Tag_Youmay.description: the genetic memory of Kassandra | the [[Loose Lips | genetic memory]] of Ezio Auditore da Firenze

MemoryInfobox.name: Loose Lips
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Impressed by Kassandra's ability to sink a fleet of ships, an Athens|Athenian spy let her know of a Spartan Commander who would decide where the ships moved next.'

General_Description: '''Loose Lips''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: An [[Athens|Athenian]] spy sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
She sought out the spy and addressed him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You left a message on the [[Message board|board]]. What's the matter?''
*'''Man:''' ''I've been tasked with keeping on eye [[Sparta]]n ship movement. I hear a lot of stories from the sailors.''
<tabber>
|-|Get to the point.=
|-|Tell me one.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And what tales have the sailors been telling you?''
*'''Man:''' ''You mean the one about the mercenary sinking their ships? Or the one about the Spartan commander deciding where the ships move next...''
</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to sink the Spartan ships.''
*'''Man:''' ''Yes, they all must sink. Do we have a deal, ''misthios?
(Accept - I'll destroy them.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you.''
*'''Man:''' ''Good. I need it done fast. And quietly.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We're done here.''
Kassandra left the spy and went forth aboard the ship ''[[Adrestia]]'', and sank some Spartan ships/killed the Spartan commander before returning to the spy.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
